title: New league client and regions it is available in?
body:
What regions is the new open beta client currently available in?
I live in Canada and wanted to try it out but i am having a hard time finding info on this.

replies.body: i figured it out! thanks for the help! Really liking the new client. Very sharp looking!

It's available on your region (NA), you just have to initiate the upgrade process. There should be a persistent button in your patcher in the top-right corner, as shown in the screenshot below:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

Let me know if you run into any issues with the upgrade process.
